description:
Our tempest tests run the following validation test for List Servers "by changes-since date" API and fail
as the expected error codes are not returned.

test_list_servers_by_changes_since_future_date - Return an error when a date in the future is passed

Expected Error Code - 400 BadRequest
Actual Code - 200 OK

The List Servers API for listing by changes-since date should send the Expected error responses as above.
title: Validation for List servers by 'changes since' date - expected error responses not returned

comments.content:
Our tempest tests run the following validation test for List Servers "by changes-since date" API and fail
as the expected error codes are not returned.

test_list_servers_by_changes_since_future_date - Return an error when a date in the future is passed

Expected Error Code - 400 BadRequest
Actual Code - 200 OK

The List Servers API for listing by changes-since date should send the Expected error responses as above.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rohitk

comments.content: That is still a valid request, users will just see an empty list.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
